amendment.description: Amendment establishes positions of Directors of Veterans Integrated Service Networks (VISN) in the VA's Office of Undersecretary for Health.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 114-742 to establish positions of Directors of Veterans Integrated Service Networks (VISN) in the VA's Office of Undersecretary for Health.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Takano.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
